thread.title: Thomas L. Friedman: Why be president?

title: Thomas L. Friedman: Why be president?
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
Having watched all the debates and seen all these people running for president, I have to wonder: Why would anyone want this job now? Do you...
